name: 專題討論（一）
description: 本課程可培養學生研究能力與口頭表達能力。前期每週兩位同學每人報告一篇原著論文，可瞭解如何搜尋資料，產生研究題目與構想，並經由閱讀論文瞭解如何設計研究，進行研究，結果分析與討論；後十週每週一位同學報告回顧型論文，可瞭解如何整理過去研究，有條理分類、循序漸進並符合邏輯推演。
goals: Expose students to advanced research topics in nutrition science.
Provide students trainings in communicating science critically and effectively
Provide students trainings in domestic and global visions
Provide students trainings in science research ethics
syllabus:
Week 1:  How to find articles and databases for your research topics

Week 2:  Attending Annual academic meeting of Taiwan Society of Lipids and Athersclerosis, International symposium of Vascular Molecular Biology. Sep. 15-16, 2018 at Zhang Rongfa

Foundation International Conference Center, Rm 801~ 803。

Week 3:  as the above.

Week 4:  Presentation of original research papers by students 1 &2

Week 5:  Presentation of original research papers by students 3 &4

Week 6:  Presentation of original research papers by students 5 & 6

Week 7:  Presentation of original research papers by students 7 & 8

Week 8:  Presentation of original research papers by students 9 & 10

Week 9:  Science communication workshop

Week 10: International Conference on Nutraceuticals. Howard civil service international house, 2F. 8:30-17:00, Nov. 11, 2018

Week 11: as the above

Week 12: Presentation of review papers by student 1& 2

Week 13: Presentation of review papers by student 3 & 4

Week 14: Presentation of review papers by student 5 & 6

Week 15: Presentation of review papers by student 7 & 8

Week 16: Presentation of review papers by student 9 & 10

Week 17: Presentation of review papers by student 11 & 12

Week 18: Discussion

methodologies.note: 學生以ppt口頭報告，學期開始2週內決定原著論文方向及出處。老師同意後將 pdf公佈於moodle，發表1週前，將ppt傳至moodle。並與發表主持人(mediator)溝通進行方式，準備視聽器材
同學對該報告提問討論，報告同學需完善解決問題
由報告主題產生研究方向與設計進行方式
